page.title: 17ROBIN HOOD:LEGEND
page.content: This is Charlotte Snowden's version of{Robin Hood.} "Robin Hood was an outlaw who roamed{ {Sherwood Forest.}He also robbed the rich and gave to the poor,he roamed the trees till he got to{Nottingham} and crept sneakily into{Nottingham {Castle}and then he robbed.Sometimes he ambushed stage coaches like highwaymen do.Robin Hood is believed to steal but when you think about it we must remember that he gave it to the poor. He was believed to get married in{ {Blidworth Church}not{Edwinstowe Church and the most common weapon he used was the{bow and arrow}he would have killed the{Deer}and eaten all he killed.Yes,Robin Hood did come to Edwinstowe.He did have{Merry Men}like{ {Friar Tuck,Little John and Will {Scarlet.}No-one knows he existed really"
